## Tidyverse
Today we cover **pipes** using `magrittr` library. Pipe operator `%>%`. Useful for code clarity cause it makes sense in chronological order. Advantages are:

- Aesthetic
- Improved clarity
- Pipes are compatible with all the rest of the Tidyverse packages.

Also, don't overuse them. Use them when help code clarity.
